text:
Title: Green Night
Chinese Name:绿夜
Year: 2023
Production Country: China Hong Kong
Genre: Romance
Language: Chinese
Release Date: February 17, 2023 (Berlin Film Festival); November 1, 2023 (South Korea)
Douban Rating: ★★★☆☆
Douban Rating Count: 5,866 users
Douban Link: https://movie.douban. com/subject/362
　　1770/
Runtime: 92 minutes
Director: Shuai Han
Cast: Bingbing Fan, Joo-young Lee, Young-ho Kim
Screenwriter: Shuai Han, Sheng Lei
Producer: Ziyi Liu, Jing Wang
Music Director: Hank Lee


Plot Summary静霞是一位在首尔执法中心安检处的移民。有一天，一位绿色头发的女孩突破了她的视野。这个不拘泥于被搜身检查的女孩让静霞感动。为了避免各自没有任何意义的妻子，她们勇敢进入韩国黑社会领域，与他们试图占领和控制她们的人反击。
